name: Symbiotic Scavenger
description:
Symbiotic Scavenger was created for the  Wowie Jam 4.0

It's a game about a human carrying ressources  back to an AI core in order to help it build more robots and make the hive grow.

Source of the game available on github

W,A,S,D to move

E or G to enter grab mod > point the white vector at a thing and Left Click to grab

Right Click to release objects

All sprites come from the Hollow Moon Tileset initially designed for Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead
